thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Cynthia

author: Cynthia
title: Cynthia
text:
Flight Hub is probably my favorite tool to book my flights.
Pros:
1. It has great prices,
2. The selections for filtering out the exact conditions you want are great, &
3. The follow up emails for deals on your next trip are well done and tailored to you
Cons:
You better know exactly what you want. You see, if you make a mistake or something happens & you need to change something, there's a $75 Fee
